message_catalog.msg: Create a new revision from the live revision:

You can update the title and content of this page below. Clicking on "OK" will make a new revision which will appear first in the list of revisions for this content portlet. Afterwards, you can review the changes made by clicking on "View". Clicking on "Publish" will then make the currently viewed version of the content "live".
There is no live version - create a new revision:
